categories: Category:Articles with elements from unlicensed sources

nodes.text: Orooturoo was the home of a race of titanic purple-colored sluglike beings, most notably Princess Nampi. It was an endpoint of both the Metellos Trade Route and the Widek Bypass.

In Supernatural Encounters: The Trial and Transformation of Arhul Hextrophon by Joseph Bongiorno, Cold Danda Sine engineered the Orooturoo, using larvae of the Varlian who had been infected by a disease created by him in Folhinor.
